resources.string: Welcome to Paper Telephone, a fun local multiplayer drawing game. This game involves three steps: draw an image based on a word, pass the device to the next player, and guess the original word associated with the drawing. To begin playing, select the New Game button on the home screen.

A canvas to draw should now be displayed on the screen. Given a word to draw, create your work of art by drawing on screen with your finger. Once finished, pass the device onto the next player in the group for the next round. This player will now try to guess the word that the drawing is based on. Once a guess has been made, pass the device again to the next player in line and create a drawing based on the guess of the previous person.

This cycle repeats until the device comes back to the player who initiated the game, or the number of chosen rounds has been reached. At this point, the game ends and a montage of the word\'s transformation will be shown.
Pass the phone to the next player. Press the Check to Continue!
